name: virgil
description: A VS Code extension that provides guided code tours through GitHub Copilot agent integration

languageModelTools.name: virgil_openFile
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Opens a file in the editor at a specified line number. Use this to show code to the user during a tour.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Opens a file at a specific line

line.description: Line number to position cursor at (1-based)

endLine.description: Optional end line for highlighting a range

languageModelTools.name: virgil_highlightLines
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Highlights a range of lines in the active editor. Clears any previous highlight. Use this to draw attention to specific code.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Highlights a range of lines in the editor

languageModelTools.name: virgil_navigateToLine
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Scrolls the active editor to center a specific line in the viewport without reopening the file.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Scrolls to a specific line in the editor

line.description: Line number to center in viewport (1-based)
